# Government Tender Announcement
## Document Capture Software Market

### Notice Details
- **Reference Number**: PW-23-01021356
- **Amendment Number**: 0
- **Solicitation Number**: 10075982
- **Publication Date**: January 13, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: January 27, 2023 1:00 PM (EST)
- **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada

### Notice Type
This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) announcing the intention to award a contract for the procurement of a Document Capture Software Market Report and Analysis.

### Tender Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking a supplier to provide a comprehensive market analysis report and quarterly reports on the document capture software market. The report should provide detailed information on the global market, major vendors, sales projections, and industry trends. Quarterly reports will be required for a period of one (1) year, from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024, with the option to extend for two (2) additional years.

### Assessment Criteria
 Suppliers interested in responding to this ACAN must submit a statement of capabilities that clearly demonstrates their capability to deliver the required analysis report and quarterly reports.

### Important Details
- The estimated value of the contract, including two one-year option periods, is $64,500.00 USD.
- The contract period is for a period of one (1) year from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024, with two (2) additional one-year option periods.
- Suppliers who are interested in bidding on this contract must submit a statement of capabilities by January 27, 2023.

### Contact Information
Suppliers are to direct all inquiries and statements of capabilities to:
Emma Wendt, Supply Specialist, Departmental Acquisitions Services, Real Property and Commercial Acquisitions Sector, Acquisitions Program, Public Works and Government Services Canada
corner of Laurier Street and PPEase Wellington Road, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
(819) 343-9608 | [emma.wendt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:emma.wendt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) [emma.wendt@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:emma.wendt@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
